scripts.clean-file: cd file && rm -Rf node_modules yarn.lock && yarn
scripts.clean-core: npm run clean-file && cd core && rm -Rf node_modules yarn.lock && yarn
scripts.clean-cli: cd cli && rm -Rf node_modules yarn.lock && yarn && cd node_modules && npm link tmake-core
scripts.build: npm run clean-cli && cd cli && npm run build
scripts.test-file: npm run clean-file && cd file && npm run build && npm test
scripts.test-core: npm run clean-core && cd core && npm run build && npm test
scripts.test-cli: npm run clean-cli && cd cli && npm run build && npm test
scripts.full-test: npm run test-file && npm run test-core && npm run test-cli
